content.new: Upon bundling, segway tries to reference an accumulator file for a run that was never queued, in minibatch. I have reproduced this twice now. In both instances, segway attempted to look for an accumulator file that did not exist, and then errored out wit
content.old: Upon bundling, segway tries to reference an accumulator file for a run that was never queued, in minibatch. I have reproduced this twice now. In both instances, segway attempted to look for an accumulator file that did not exist, and then errored out wit

issue.title: Upon bundling, segway tries to reference an accumulator file for a run that was never queued in minibatch

message.raw: GMTK creates this error. Check the arguments for the bundle job. It is being given a range for accumulators that goes beyond 756.
message.html: GMTK creates this error. Check the arguments for the bundle job. It is being given a range for accumulators that goes beyond 756.
